name: Hero's Rime
effects: Increase all stats by 40% for 3 turns to all allies while singing

Heldenlied

desc_short: Boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all allies while singing

desc_long: Boosts ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all allies while singing.
歌唱期間，提高全體隊員狀態的數值。
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 능력치가 상승합니다.
Augmente les stats de tous les alliés en chantant.
Während das Lied andauert, steigen die Attribute aller Verbündeten.
